name: A. Rupam Mahmood
content: Rupam's Website A. Rupam Mahmood Associate Professor Department of Computing Science University of Alberta Affiliations: Canada CIFAR AI Chair Alberta Machine Intelligence Institute (Amii) PI of Vision & Robotics lab, RLAI lab Email: armahmood@ualberta.ca Google Scholar Profile Talks Streaming deep reinforcement learning: Slides Video Continual robot learning: Video Research My research objective is to understand scalable and general learning mechanisms for continually improving agents. To this end, I develop continual reinforcement and representation learning algorithms and real-time learning systems, sometimes for controlling physical robots. Past and ongoing programs NSERC proposal 2020 (one-page summary) Advice for researchers What's your scientific style? (from a talk by Allen Newell) You and your research (Richard W. Hamming) Blog on free will
